import React,{useEffect,useState} from "react"; import "./style.css"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import axios from 'axios' export function CuerpoLab() { const [campos,setCampos] = useState(nombre_laboratorio,bloque,nivel,aula,capacidad,area,red_hidraulica,red_gases_especiales,red_electrica,red_aire,otros) const postLabs = (e) => { let lab = { nombre_laboratorio, bloque, nivel, aula, capacidad, area, red_hidraulica, red_gases_especiales, red_electrica, red_aire, otros } e.preventDefault(); axios.post('http://localhost:5610/api/v1/laboratorios',lab); } onChange = (e) => { const value = e.target.value; setCampos({ ...campos, [e.target.name]:value }) console.log(e.target.value) } return (
